task.title: Basic Cleaning Process
task.shortdesc: Follow this set of instructions to properly clean your Keuirg. Doing this regularly can help prevent clogs from happening.

step.cmd: Remove water reservoir and clean with dish soap and warm water. Be sure to use a non-abrasive sponge or rag. Be sure to remove all debris and calcium scaling.
Remove the pod holder and scrub to make sure and debris and coffee grounds are gone.
After you have cleaned all the parts try to run a few cups without a pod in. If it is not producing a full cup or boiling water the next step needed would be to use a descaling solution.
